Camera.Flash:: Laser AF, Zeiss optics, Zeiss T* lens coating, LED flash, panorama, HDR, 3D LUT import
Camera.Second camera:: 50 MP, f/2.6, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/1.95", PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom

Design.Materials:: Glass front, aluminum alloy frame, glass back
Design.Biometrics:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Design.Resistance:: IP68/IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)

Display.Features:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass

Cellular.SIM type::
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM + eSIM (max 2 at a time) - International
· Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM - China

Hardware.OS:: Android 16, up to 4 major Android upgrades, Funtouch 16 (International), OriginOS 6 (China)

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
Connectivity & Features.Location:: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (L1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)
